mapper.insert: insert into replication_applier_status (CHANNEL_NAME, SERVICE_STATE, REMAINING_DELAY, COUNT_TRANSACTIONS_RETRIES) values (#{CHANNEL_NAME,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{SERVICE_STATE,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{REMAINING_DELAY,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{COUNT_TRANSACTIONS_RETRIES,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select CHANNEL_NAME, SERVICE_STATE, REMAINING_DELAY, COUNT_TRANSACTIONS_RETRIES from replication_applier_status
